Workshop: Web Exploitation Basics

Published on 2025-09-15 by Club Executive

Hey Member, as promised, we're holding another workshop this Thursday!

This time we'll be going over the basics of web exploitation. (Don't forget that attendance grants you points in the Leaderboard as we prepare for CyberSci and CTF's!)

Join us on the 18th of September at 6pm in HP 5345.

P.S. make sure you come with a computer that has Kali Linux installed (which can be through virtual machine). Here is a guide you can follow to install it on VirtualBox: https://linuxsimply.com/linux-basics/os-installation/virtual-machine/kali-linux-on-virtualbox/

See you there!
